divs: Sighting DetailsI was out on my front porch haveing a smoke and enjoying the night weather when i noticed this star off to my left,blinking fast and changeing size, i rand back in the house and grabed my video camera to record this even and the thing changes possition on my but i was able to capture a little on video.i thought the whole event was rather interesting to say the least.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
